00056 /* struct */
00057 
00058 struct bContext {
00059     int thread;
00060 
00061     /* windowmanager context */
00062     struct {
00063         struct wmWindowManager *manager;
00064         struct wmWindow *window;
00065         struct bScreen *screen;
00066         struct ScrArea *area;
00067         struct ARegion *region;
00068         struct ARegion *menu;
00069         struct bContextStore *store;
00070         const char *operator_poll_msg; /* reason for poll failing */
00071     } wm;
00072     
00073     /* data context */
00074     struct {
00075         struct Main *main;
00076         struct Scene *scene;
00077 
00078         int recursion;
00079         int py_init; /* true if python is initialized */
00080         void *py_context;
00081     } data;
00082     
00083     /* data evaluation */
00084     struct {
00085         int render;
00086     } eval;
00087 };
00088 
00089 /* context */
00090 
00091 bContext *CTX_create(void)
00092 {
00093     bContext *C;
00094     
00095     C= MEM_callocN(sizeof(bContext), "bContext");
00096 
00097     return C;
00098 }
00099 
00100 bContext *CTX_copy(const bContext *C)
00101 {
00102     bContext *newC= MEM_dupallocN((void*)C);
00103 
00104     return newC;
00105 }
00106 
00107 void CTX_free(bContext *C)
00108 {
00109     MEM_freeN(C);
00110 }
00111 
00112 /* store */
00113 
00114 bContextStore *CTX_store_add(ListBase *contexts, const char *name, PointerRNA *ptr)
00115 {
00116     bContextStoreEntry *entry;
00117     bContextStore *ctx, *lastctx;
00118 
00119     /* ensure we have a context to put the entry in, if it was already used
00120      * we have to copy the context to ensure */
00121     ctx= contexts->last;
00122 
00123     if (!ctx || ctx->used) {
00124         if (ctx) {
00125             lastctx= ctx;
00126             ctx= MEM_dupallocN(lastctx);
00127             BLI_duplicatelist(&ctx->entries, &lastctx->entries);
00128         }
00129         else
00130             ctx= MEM_callocN(sizeof(bContextStore), "bContextStore");
00131 
00132         BLI_addtail(contexts, ctx);
00133     }
00134 
00135     entry= MEM_callocN(sizeof(bContextStoreEntry), "bContextStoreEntry");
00136     BLI_strncpy(entry->name, name, sizeof(entry->name));
00137     entry->ptr= *ptr;
00138 
00139     BLI_addtail(&ctx->entries, entry);
00140 
00141     return ctx;
00142 }
00143 
00144 bContextStore *CTX_store_add_all(ListBase *contexts, bContextStore *context)
00145 {
00146     bContextStoreEntry *entry, *tentry;
00147     bContextStore *ctx, *lastctx;
00148 
00149     /* ensure we have a context to put the entries in, if it was already used
00150      * we have to copy the context to ensure */
00151     ctx= contexts->last;
00152 
00153     if (!ctx || ctx->used) {
00154         if (ctx) {
00155             lastctx= ctx;
00156             ctx= MEM_dupallocN(lastctx);
00157             BLI_duplicatelist(&ctx->entries, &lastctx->entries);
00158         }
00159         else
00160             ctx= MEM_callocN(sizeof(bContextStore), "bContextStore");
00161 
00162         BLI_addtail(contexts, ctx);
00163     }
00164 
00165     for (tentry= context->entries.first; tentry; tentry= tentry->next) {
00166         entry= MEM_dupallocN(tentry);
00167         BLI_addtail(&ctx->entries, entry);
00168     }
00169 
00170     return ctx;
00171 }
00172 
00173 void CTX_store_set(bContext *C, bContextStore *store)
00174 {
00175     C->wm.store= store;
00176 }
00177 
00178 bContextStore *CTX_store_copy(bContextStore *store)
00179 {
00180     bContextStore *ctx;
00181 
00182     ctx= MEM_dupallocN(store);
00183     BLI_duplicatelist(&ctx->entries, &store->entries);
00184 
00185     return ctx;
00186 }
00187 
00188 void CTX_store_free(bContextStore *store)
00189 {
00190     BLI_freelistN(&store->entries);
00191     MEM_freeN(store);
00192 }
00193 
00194 void CTX_store_free_list(ListBase *contexts)
00195 {
00196     bContextStore *ctx;
00197 
00198     while ((ctx= contexts->first)) {
00199         BLI_remlink(contexts, ctx);
00200         CTX_store_free(ctx);
00201     }
00202 }

00454 /* data context utility functions */
00455 
00456 struct bContextDataResult {
00457     PointerRNA ptr;
00458     ListBase list;
00459     const char **dir;
00460     short type; /* 0: normal, 1: seq */
00461 };
00462 
00463 static int ctx_data_get(bContext *C, const char *member, bContextDataResult *result)
00464 {
00465     int done= 0, recursion= C->data.recursion;
00466     int ret= 0;
00467 
00468     memset(result, 0, sizeof(bContextDataResult));
00469 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00470     if (CTX_py_dict_get(C)) {
00471         return BPY_context_member_get(C, member, result);
00472 //      if (BPY_context_member_get(C, member, result))
00473 //          return 1;
00474     }
00475 #endif
00476     /* we check recursion to ensure that we do not get infinite
00477      * loops requesting data from ourselfs in a context callback */
00478 
00479     /* Ok, this looks evil...
00480      * if (ret) done= -(-ret | -done);
00481      *
00482      * Values in order of importance
00483      * (0, -1, 1) - Where 1 is highest priority
00484      * */
00485     if (done!=1 && recursion < 1 && C->wm.store) {
00486         bContextStoreEntry *entry;
00487 
00488         C->data.recursion= 1;
00489 
00490         entry= BLI_rfindstring(&C->wm.store->entries, member, offsetof(bContextStoreEntry, name));
00491         if (entry) {
00492             result->ptr= entry->ptr;
00493             done= 1;
00494         }
00495     }
00496     if (done!=1 && recursion < 2 && C->wm.region) {
00497         C->data.recursion= 2;
00498         if (C->wm.region->type && C->wm.region->type->context) {
00499             ret = C->wm.region->type->context(C, member, result);
00500             if (ret) done= -(-ret | -done);
00501 
00502         }
00503     }
00504     if (done!=1 && recursion < 3 && C->wm.area) {
00505         C->data.recursion= 3;
00506         if (C->wm.area->type && C->wm.area->type->context) {
00507             ret = C->wm.area->type->context(C, member, result);
00508             if (ret) done= -(-ret | -done);
00509         }
00510     }
00511     if (done!=1 && recursion < 4 && C->wm.screen) {
00512         bContextDataCallback cb= C->wm.screen->context;
00513         C->data.recursion= 4;
00514         if (cb) {
00515             ret = cb(C, member, result);
00516             if (ret) done= -(-ret | -done);
00517         }
00518     }
00519 
00520     C->data.recursion= recursion;
00521 
00522     return done;
00523 }
00524 
00525 static void *ctx_data_pointer_get(const bContext *C, const char *member)
00526 {
00527     bContextDataResult result;
00528 
00529     if (C && ctx_data_get((bContext*)C, member, &result)==1)
00530         return result.ptr.data;
00531 
00532     return NULL;
00533 }
00534 
00535 static int ctx_data_pointer_verify(const bContext *C, const char *member, void **pointer)
00536 {
00537     bContextDataResult result;
00538 
00539     /* if context is NULL, pointer must be NULL too and that is a valid return */
00540     if (C == NULL) {
00541         *pointer= NULL;
00542         return 1;
00543     }
00544     else if (ctx_data_get((bContext*)C, member, &result)==1) {
00545         *pointer= result.ptr.data;
00546         return 1;
00547     }
00548     else {
00549         *pointer= NULL;
00550         return 0;
00551     }
00552 }
00553 
00554 static int ctx_data_collection_get(const bContext *C, const char *member, ListBase *list)
00555 {
00556     bContextDataResult result;
00557 
00558     if (ctx_data_get((bContext*)C, member, &result)==1) {
00559         *list= result.list;
00560         return 1;
00561     }
00562 
00563     list->first= NULL;
00564     list->last= NULL;
00565 
00566     return 0;
00567 }
00568 
00569 PointerRNA CTX_data_pointer_get(const bContext *C, const char *member)
00570 {
00571     bContextDataResult result;
00572 
00573     if (ctx_data_get((bContext*)C, member, &result)==1)
00574         return result.ptr;
00575     else
00576         return PointerRNA_NULL;
00577 }
00578 
00579 PointerRNA CTX_data_pointer_get_type(const bContext *C, const char *member, StructRNA *type)
00580 {
00581     PointerRNA ptr = CTX_data_pointer_get(C, member);
00582 
00583     if (ptr.data && RNA_struct_is_a(ptr.type, type))
00584         return ptr;
00585     
00586     return PointerRNA_NULL;
00587 }
00588 
00589 ListBase CTX_data_collection_get(const bContext *C, const char *member)
00590 {
00591     bContextDataResult result;
00592 
00593     if (ctx_data_get((bContext*)C, member, &result)==1) {
00594         return result.list;
00595     }
00596     else {
00597         ListBase list= {NULL, NULL};
00598         return list;
00599     }
00600 }
00601 
00602 /* 1:found,  -1:found but not set,  0:not found */
00603 int CTX_data_get(const bContext *C, const char *member, PointerRNA *r_ptr, ListBase *r_lb, short *r_type)
00604 {
00605     bContextDataResult result;
00606     int ret= ctx_data_get((bContext*)C, member, &result);
00607 
00608     if (ret==1) {
00609         *r_ptr= result.ptr;
00610         *r_lb= result.list;
00611         *r_type= result.type;
00612     }
00613     else {
00614         memset(r_ptr, 0, sizeof(*r_ptr));
00615         memset(r_lb, 0, sizeof(*r_lb));
00616         *r_type= 0;
00617     }
00618 
00619     return ret;
00620 }
00621 
00622 static void data_dir_add(ListBase *lb, const char *member)
00623 {
00624     LinkData *link;
00625     
00626     if (strcmp(member, "scene") == 0) /* exception */
00627         return;
00628 
00629     if (BLI_findstring(lb, member, offsetof(LinkData, data)))
00630         return;
00631     
00632     link= MEM_callocN(sizeof(LinkData), "LinkData");
00633     link->data= (void*)member;
00634     BLI_addtail(lb, link);
00635 }
00636 
00637 ListBase CTX_data_dir_get(const bContext *C)
00638 {
00639     bContextDataResult result;
00640     ListBase lb;
00641     int a;
00642 
00643     memset(&lb, 0, sizeof(lb));
00644 
00645     if (C->wm.store) {
00646         bContextStoreEntry *entry;
00647 
00648         for (entry=C->wm.store->entries.first; entry; entry=entry->next)
00649             data_dir_add(&lb, entry->name);
00650     }
00651     if (C->wm.region && C->wm.region->type && C->wm.region->type->context) {
00652         memset(&result, 0, sizeof(result));
00653         C->wm.region->type->context(C, "", &result);
00654 
00655         if (result.dir)
00656             for (a=0; result.dir[a]; a++)
00657                 data_dir_add(&lb, result.dir[a]);
00658     }
00659     if (C->wm.area && C->wm.area->type && C->wm.area->type->context) {
00660         memset(&result, 0, sizeof(result));
00661         C->wm.area->type->context(C, "", &result);
00662 
00663         if (result.dir)
00664             for (a=0; result.dir[a]; a++)
00665                 data_dir_add(&lb, result.dir[a]);
00666     }
00667     if (C->wm.screen && C->wm.screen->context) {
00668         bContextDataCallback cb= C->wm.screen->context;
00669         memset(&result, 0, sizeof(result));
00670         cb(C, "", &result);
00671 
00672         if (result.dir)
00673             for (a=0; result.dir[a]; a++)
00674                 data_dir_add(&lb, result.dir[a]);
00675     }
00676 
00677     return lb;
00678 }
00679 
00680 int CTX_data_equals(const char *member, const char *str)
00681 {
00682     return (strcmp(member, str) == 0);
00683 }

00685 int CTX_data_dir(const char *member)
00686 {
00687     return member[0] == '\0';
00688 }

00699 
00700 void CTX_data_id_list_add(bContextDataResult *result, ID *id)
00701 {
00702     CollectionPointerLink *link;
00703 
00704     link= MEM_callocN(sizeof(CollectionPointerLink), "CTX_data_id_list_add");
00705     RNA_id_pointer_create(id, &link->ptr);
00706 
00707     BLI_addtail(&result->list, link);
00708 }
00709 
00710 void CTX_data_list_add(bContextDataResult *result, ID *id, StructRNA *type, void *data)
00711 {
00712     CollectionPointerLink *link;
00713 
00714     link= MEM_callocN(sizeof(CollectionPointerLink), "CTX_data_list_add");
00715     RNA_pointer_create(id, type, data, &link->ptr);
00716 
00717     BLI_addtail(&result->list, link);
00718 }
00719 
00720 int ctx_data_list_count(const bContext *C, int (*func)(const bContext*, ListBase*))
00721 {
00722     ListBase list;
00723 
00724     if (func(C, &list)) {
00725         int tot= BLI_countlist(&list);
00726         BLI_freelistN(&list);
00727         return tot;
00728     }
00729     else
00730         return 0;
00731 }

00750 Main *CTX_data_main(const bContext *C)
00751 {
00752     Main *bmain;
00753 
00754     if (ctx_data_pointer_verify(C, "blend_data", (void*)&bmain))
00755         return bmain;
00756     else
00757         return C->data.main;
00758 }
00759 
00760 void CTX_data_main_set(bContext *C, Main *bmain)
00761 {
00762     C->data.main= bmain;
00763 }
00764 
00765 Scene *CTX_data_scene(const bContext *C)
00766 {
00767     Scene *scene;
00768 
00769     if (ctx_data_pointer_verify(C, "scene", (void*)&scene))
00770         return scene;
00771     else
00772         return C->data.scene;
00773 }
00774 
00775 int CTX_data_mode_enum(const bContext *C)
00776 {
00777     Object *obedit= CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00778 
00779     if (obedit) {
00780         switch(obedit->type) {
00781             case OB_MESH:
00782                 return CTX_MODE_EDIT_MESH;
00783             case OB_CURVE:
00784                 return CTX_MODE_EDIT_CURVE;
00785             case OB_SURF:
00786                 return CTX_MODE_EDIT_SURFACE;
00787             case OB_FONT:
00788                 return CTX_MODE_EDIT_TEXT;
00789             case OB_ARMATURE:
00790                 return CTX_MODE_EDIT_ARMATURE;
00791             case OB_MBALL:
00792                 return CTX_MODE_EDIT_METABALL;
00793             case OB_LATTICE:
00794                 return CTX_MODE_EDIT_LATTICE;
00795         }
00796     }
00797     else {
00798         Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00799 
00800         if (ob) {
00801             if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE) return CTX_MODE_POSE;
00802             else if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_SCULPT)  return CTX_MODE_SCULPT;
00803             else if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT) return CTX_MODE_PAINT_WEIGHT;
00804             else if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT) return CTX_MODE_PAINT_VERTEX;
00805             else if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT) return CTX_MODE_PAINT_TEXTURE;
00806             else if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT) return CTX_MODE_PARTICLE;
00807         }
00808     }
00809 
00810     return CTX_MODE_OBJECT;
00811 }
00812 
00813 
00814 /* would prefer if we can use the enum version below over this one - Campbell */
00815 /* must be aligned with above enum  */
00816 static const char *data_mode_strings[] = {
00817     "mesh_edit",
00818     "curve_edit",
00819     "surface_edit",
00820     "text_edit",
00821     "armature_edit",
00822     "mball_edit",
00823     "lattice_edit",
00824     "posemode",
00825     "sculpt_mode",
00826     "weightpaint",
00827     "vertexpaint",
00828     "imagepaint",
00829     "particlemode",
00830     "objectmode",
00831     NULL
00832 };
00833 const char *CTX_data_mode_string(const bContext *C)
00834 {
00835     return data_mode_strings[CTX_data_mode_enum(C)];
00836 }

00848         return scene->toolsettings;

00850         return NULL;
00851 }
